aka: A Journey Through the Capital of Electronic Music
trans_title: A Journey Through the Capital of Electronic Music
introduction: Berlin. The city, that is beloved for its electronic music and admired for its nightlife. There are 3.6 million residents living in this city. Every year 12 million tourists come and visit the capital. There are more than 300 clubs in Berlin. The exact number of DJs is unidentified. But for sure, there are plenty of them...
